entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning except northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys late this morning and this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
